definition: to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
surname Zha
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
see 山查[shan1 zha1]
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: Land acquisition and demolition of illegal behavior, according to the law severely punished.
sentences.chinese: 对违法违规征地拆迁行为，依法依规严肃查处。

sentences.english: The relevant department or entity shall do so in accordance with the law and give the woman a reply.
sentences.chinese: 有关部门或者单位应当依法查处，并予以答复。

sentences.english: We will tighten oversight for production safety in accordance with the law and investigate and prosecute cases involving industrial accidents to the full extent of the law.
sentences.chinese: 要依法加强监管，严肃查处安全生产事故。

sentences.english: One is investigating the development and construction of the illegal acts.
sentences.chinese: 一是依法查处开发建设中的违法违规行为。

sentences.english: We will make investigating and prosecuting major violations of the law and discipline an important task in the ?ght against corruption.
sentences.chinese: 要把查处违法违纪大案要案，作为反腐败的重要任务。

sentences.english: In current, the work of handle the public order was existed some problems.
sentences.chinese: 当前，治安案件查处工作存在诸多问题。

sentences.english: Officials should be shamed into stopping their friends from stealing or wasting water.
sentences.chinese: 政府高官要严肃查处偷水浪费水的现象。

sentences.english: After the holiday, the National Tourism Bureau released the exposure typical cases investigated.
sentences.chinese: 节后，国家旅游局将曝光公布典型案例查处情况。

sentences.english: Gioia says that action must now be taken to find and deal with the major West African sources of the pollutants.
sentences.chinese: 骄雅说必须采取行动查处非洲西海岸氯联苯污染源。

sentences.english: The administrative department of industry and commerce with the ban "black bars."
sentences.chinese: 积极配合工商行政管理部门查处取缔“黑网吧”。

sentences.english: We will conduct in-depth investigations into cases of dereliction of duty and corruption related to production safety and severely punish the responsible parties.
sentences.chinese: 严肃查处安全生产领域的失职渎职和腐败问题。

sentences.english: Measurement of punishment in dealing with public order cases is the application of discretion.
sentences.chinese: 治安案件查处中的量罚是自由裁量权的运用。

sentences.english: Acceleromater, preamplifier and display are installed in a pocket-size vibration mete.
sentences.chinese: 前置放大器和显示安装在口袋大小的振动查处。

sentences.english: The police has worked out how the thieves entered that building.
sentences.chinese: 警察已经查处小偷是怎么进入那座大楼了。

sentences.english: We should promptly investigate and prosecute major cases of sabotage against the order of the market economy.
sentences.chinese: 抓紧查处严重破坏市场经济秩序的大案要案。

sentences.english: And urges the Administrative law enforcement organ to investigate the illegal management behavior legally.
sentences.chinese: 并促使行政执法机关依法查处违法经营行为。

definition: to seize/to confiscate
to strike a severe blow/to crack down/to take strong measures
to investigate strictly
to track down and seize (a criminal suspect, contraband etc)
illegal/to break the law
to bring under control/to regulate/to restore to good condition/(coll.) to fix (a person)/to prepare (a meal etc)
to be a suspect (in a crime)/to be suspected of
to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
unlicensed business activity
to violate (rules)/irregular/illegal/corrupt
to investigate thoroughly/to carefully inspect/to verify/to ferret out (undesirable elements)
sudden unannounced investigation/on-the-spot inspection/to search without notification
to file for investigation/to prosecute (a case)
to suppress/to crack down on/to prohibit
to transfer (a case, a person, files etc)
driving under the influence of alcohol (DUI)
